data.title: Sean Garrett Signs to Jay
data.meta_description: This morning while being interviewed by Shade 45's The Morning After host Angela Yee and ...
data.meta_site_name: Singersroom.com - R&B Music, R&B Videos, R&B News
data.text:
This morning while being interviewed by Shade 45’s The Morning After host Angela Yee and debuting his âShe Geekedâ remix featuring Busta Rhymes, Ludacris, and Twista, Sean Garrett reveals that he just signed a deal with Roc Nation/Columbia Records even though he had been in talks with Young Money/Cash Money for some time. He says heâll always be available to Cash Money. Sean Garrett also says he didnât have to sign a 360 deal, but he doesnât see anything wrong if both parties have a vested interest. Garrettâs mixtape âThe Inkwellâ is available for download now and the debut album is due out in 2011.

It’s a match made in hip-hop heaven! Sean Garrett, the famed Grammy Award winning songwriter and producer, is signing to Jay-Z’s Roc Nation label. This move marks an exciting new chapter for both artists as they join forces to create something special. As one of the most influential figures in pop music today, fans can’t wait to hear what this duo has up their sleeves.

Sean Garrett’s career began back in 2005 with his first hit single “My Boo” featuring Usher and Alicia Keys. Since then he has written and co-written some of the biggest hits of our generation including Beyoncé’s “Ring The Alarm” and Rihanna’s “Umbrella.” He was even nominated for a Grammy for producing Chris Brown’s smash hit “Kiss Kiss” from 2007. It comes as no surprise that such a talented artist would be picked up by someone like Jay-Z.

For over two decades Jay-Z has been at the forefront of hip hop culture; not only making waves with his own music but also through his record label Roc Nation. With its star studded roster which includes artists like Calvin Harris, Meek Mill and Rihanna it looks like there will be nothing stopping them being successful together.

Background Of Sean Garrett

Sean Garrett has been a staple in the hip hop and R&B music industry for over two decades. A songwriter and producer, he has worked with some of the biggest names in entertainment such as Usher, Beyonce, Justin Bieber, Nicki Minaj, Lil Wayne and more. He is widely known for his work on hits like “Yeah!” by Usher featuring Ludacris, “Turnin’ Me On” by Keri Hilson, and “Drop It Low” by Ester Dean. In 2020 he signed to Jay-Z’s Roc Nation label.

Garrett was born in Atlanta, Georgia and began producing beats at the age of 14 after being inspired by producers such as Timbaland and The Neptunes. By 17 he had been given production credits on albums from popular artists like Ciara and Bow Wow. After years of hard work he quickly gained recognition as one of the top producers in the game. His unique style earned him awards including five ASCAP Awards (American Society of Composers Authors & Publishers) between 2007–2010.

In May 2020 it was announced that Sean Garrett had officially joined forces with Jay-Z’s record label Roc Nation where he will continue creating chart topping hits while also developing new talent under the record label umbrella. This move solidifies him as one of the most sought after writers/producers in music today and gives fans something to look forward to down the line.

Overview Of Roc Nation

Roc Nation is a music entertainment company founded by hip-hop mogul Jay-Z in 2008. It serves as an umbrella for various aspects of the entertainment industry, such as management, record label services, touring and merchandising. The company has since become one of the premier destinations for many top artists to join forces with when it comes to their careers. With Sean Garrett now part of its roster, Roc Nation’s presence in both hip hop and R&B continues to grow even stronger while giving fans something new to look forward to.

The signing of Sean Garrett marks yet another achievement from Roc Nation’s impressive decade plus run. As mentioned before, they are currently home to some of the biggest names in the business which includes J Cole, Rihanna and DJ Khaled just to name a few. With Sean joining them on board, Roc Nation can easily boast that they have one of the most talented rosters in all genres not only musically but also when it comes to production credits too!

By enlisting Sean Garrett’s skillset into their family, Roc Nation solidifies itself as an authority within the music scene. His combination of experience and talent make him a valuable asset who will no doubt help lead the way for future generations looking to break into this field. As we continue watching this team flourish during these times, there’s no telling what amazing projects may come out next!

Conclusion

In conclusion, Sean Garrett’s signing to Roc Nation has been a great success. He had always dreamt of being part of one of the biggest music empires in hip hop and his hard work paid off when he was deemed worthy enough by Jay-Z. It wasn’t an easy journey but with determination and perseverance, he achieved what many thought impossible.

Sean is now able to use the platform that Roc Nation provides to reach even more fans and showcase his talent on a much larger scale than before. With access to high profile events, exclusive resources and industry contacts, opportunities have opened up for him like never before. His career trajectory looks very promising as everything from his production skills to writing lyrics will be taken to new heights due to this partnership.

Overall, this move only highlights how dedicated Sean Garrett is towards perfecting his craft and taking it further than ever expected. We look forward to seeing all the amazing things he can accomplish while at Roc Nation!
